website_summaries.verdict: Though its high-end looks are in line with its price, the capacity doesn't live up to expectations.
pros: Attractive, sleek design w/dual cooling zones
Wooden shelves are durable, and operation is fairly quiet
cons: Owners say it doesn't come close to holding 29 bottles as described

customer_reviews.title: Just performed past the 30 day Amazon return window and then started to degrade
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cooler for our kitchen remodel, and after 1 month it makes a very loud noise. It is easily the loudest appliance in the room and I"m tempted to keep it turned off all the time. So basically I purchased an $800 brick. When I tried to return it, the 30 day return window had been exceeded. I will never purchase this product again, and cannot recommend it to anyone. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: RC-DFW

customer_reviews.title: compressor broke
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the previous reviews about this product and never purchased. I bought it because it fit the dimensions of the old trash compactor that was under the counter. Compressor broke just over one year old and out of warranty. Paid a lot of money for just one year of use. Spoke to Evan in customer service who offered me 25% and free shipping on a new unit. Why would I buy a new one!!! The product is clearly no good. Do not buy this wine cooler
customer_reviews.author: Donna Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can I give less than one star? This is a piece of crap. The compressor failed at 30 days. The customer service from New Air said we don’t have that part, try back in 30 days. Are you joking? Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: YES - IT HOLDS 29 BOTTLES
customer_reviews.text: This does hold 29 bottles. I know the photo's and lots of other reviews make it look like it only holds 15-16 bottles. However the video for this product on the Newair website clearly shows that each of the five shelves is deep enough to hold five bottles, 3 in one direction and 2 in the other. You can also see that the top and bottom shelves have more vertical room than the other 3, which allows two more bottles to be stacked on top of the five. That's 29 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Vaillant

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wine cooler approx. 1 year ago and now the temperature will not go below 70degrees F I spoke to a repair tech and he told me just throw it away buy another brand. I am very disappointed and plan on trying to get a replacement or a refund. I will post my results.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet Unit
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit for over a year now and is working magnificently! Holds temperature dead on and super quiet. Do not even know it is running. I did buy the 4 year warranty based on some of the reviews that I read, but this one is working superbly so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shuffleboy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product.... high quality, looks and performance is 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Installed great! Noise is super quiet. I can’t tell which temperature controls which area and I have all my wines mixed right now so I will read directions soon enough. One level couldn’t hold champagne bottles but another could. Looks great inside my kitchen remodel! Wish the label on the glass was easier to peel off. Now I need to purchase goo gone and scrape off and clean all the glass. Too exhausted right now after remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah J.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find affordable black wine fridge. Bought for a custom home build job, clients LOVE it! Accents the kitchen and matches the black appliances perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Darcy

customer_reviews.title: Even Amazon says stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Unit was DOA on arrival. Unit failed to produce any cold air showing a lack of any final test for quality control purposes. Now this massive brick has to be repacked and shipped back. Amazon rep said that this has happened numerous times with this brand and to avoid it in the next choice.
customer_reviews.author: AHAnto

customer_reviews.title: Wish both sections could go to 40F
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint: we are white wine drinkers, so we usually have wayyy more white wine. The lower half holds more bottles, but only goes to 50F, whereas the top goes to 40F. Other than that, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and good quality. My only question is how it is meant for 29 bottles I think 20 is possible
customer_reviews.author: Michael lair

customer_reviews.title: Went bust in a month !
customer_reviews.text: After a month of struggling with it's hard to operate zones, we got it to work. Then it just stopped cooling !
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine cooler have not heard any excessive nosie.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Nice wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: Nice wine fridge. Quiet. Wish it had equal slots for reds and whites. Came with a small dent on the back corner and amazon offered several options. Happy with the resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Mama J

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: My NewAir wine cooler is just exactly what I wanted. Fits my cabinet perfect, looks great. Keeps the perfect temperature and is not noisy at all! I would definitely buy NewAir again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This wine fridge is absolutely perfect! It is easy to install, sleek, and efficient. It runs quietly, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: no warrantee or product support after 1year
customer_reviews.text: wine storage. stopped working after 3 years and could not get parts or support. NEVER BUY THIS COOLER.
customer_reviews.author: R. JAMES KAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Unit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cooler for my wife as an early Christmas present. Replaced a trash compactor and it fit the space like a glove. Mommy’s happy which makes me happy😜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item return
customer_reviews.text: I returned the wine cooler because it was the size that was in the description was not the actual size. I ended ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: At best, it will hold 15-16 bottles @750 ml each
customer_reviews.text: This is touted as a 29 bottle cooler. It is not. At best, it will hold 15-16 bottles @750 ml each. There are five shelves which are 11" wide and approximately 17 inches deep. A shelf holds three bottles easily but trying to place a fourth bottle, average height of a wine bottle is 12", is impossible. The cooler is very quiet and attractive and since my purchase in December, 2016 has held the temperature well. But it is absolutely NOT a 29 bottle cooler, unless you're cooling splits or bottles smaller than a fifth.
customer_reviews.author: MOB

customer_reviews.title: Jb
customer_reviews.text: Well designed unit that looks great. It keeps the temperature very well.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: Loving the wine fridge.....
customer_reviews.text: I received the fridge perfectly packaged and boxed. Of course UPS smashed up the exterior box however the double boxed packaging was great to prevent damage to the fridge. I had this installed as part of a new kitchen renovation in a condo and it looks perfect as part of the cabinet built-in. It is not noisy at all and the blue light adds a perfect touch.
customer_reviews.author: Evon G.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. I don't understand the claims that it's loud. I'm noise sensitive and it's very quiet. Looks great. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Biff E Waters

customer_reviews.title: ... fridge for a couple months now and it's been great. It runs very quietly and the temp seems ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this fridge for a couple months now and it's been great. It runs very quietly and the temp seems to stay where I put t. One thing that isn't the best is that the shelves are a bit too tight even for regular wine bottle so I'm guessing anything else would not fit.
customer_reviews.author: dkamp

customer_reviews.title: Sure like this compressor style cooler
customer_reviews.text: Sure like this compressor style cooler better then my old thermoelectric style. Makes less noise and cools much better.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. As many others have stated
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. As many others have stated, it's highly unlikely that you could get 29 'regular' wine bottles in there. So far I can't even get half that... and that's just with a random variety of bottles. But it works for me cuz I rarely have 29 bottles at one time! The unit looks beautiful and is very well packed. Actual temp doesn't get down quite a cool as the digital readout, but close enough. Runs very quietly IMO. If it's completely silent in the room you can hear it... but it's so quiet and faint you're not really sure where the sound is coming from.
customer_reviews.author: D. True

customer_reviews.title: This wine refrigerator is perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: This wine refrigerator is perfect so far. What a difference it makes to be able to drink wine at the right temperatures: about 60 degrees for red and 45 degrees for white. The taste is over the moon incredible. I am able to store about 20 bottles of wine in mine. For my purposes, that is more than enough. The unit makes hardly any noise and no perceptible vibration. I am extremely happy with this purchase for my new kitchen. My advice: buy one for your home asap!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This item does not work! We received it and didn't install it right away, now that it is the temperature is between 78 and 80 degrees! Great purchase! DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: lori bosi

customer_reviews.title: and was delighted to see that the product was as described by ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my New Air wine cooler today, and was delighted to see that the product was as described by seller. Have been searching for the right cooler for 2 months. Temperature is holding well. Will update later, after using it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are pleased
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the unit from reviews after a ton of research. Overall we are pleased. The dual control is very easy to use, and the lighting is very pleasant. It is very quiet, so like that. I know it is set to optimal temps, but the only thing I wish was different is the option to chill below 40 degrees. So, it you plan to drink a chilled wine, I recommend moving the wine to the top rack prior to opening, or move the bottle to the fridge a few hours prior to opening. Overall, we are very pleased, and I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian I.

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, But dented
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and attractive unit. Every feature looks great. However it did come with a dent just below the handle. I believe this was done at the factory, because all the packaging was first rate. it was double boxed with Styrofoam wrapping the unit. Not a scuff or scratch on any of boxes or packing material. Hence damage was probably done at the factory. Gotta love quality control! Since I live in the Virgin Islands shipping back is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lefler

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky trays
customer_reviews.text: We returned this. The trays sounded like nails on a chalkboard when being pulled out and it looked cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to go in my kitchen island. It's the perfect size and holds plenty of bottles of wine. It's also nice and quiet and looks good! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: lilypudding

customer_reviews.title: Died after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Always get insurance on a wine fridge. They are just not quality in general but this one took the cake for arriving with a dented back corner then died after one year of usage. Compressor stopped working and repair guy said they are never worth fixing.
customer_reviews.author: kmags

customer_reviews.title: Cools great, looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this baby is QUIET. We opened the box (well packaged) and plugged it in without installing under the counter, to test it out. It was so quiet we had to practically put our ear on the top to make sure it was running. Cools great, looks beautiful. Only negative we found was when we reversed the door for a right-hand opening; the "newair" logo is now upside down. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great and looks great. Fits pinot noir as well as standard wine bottles.
customer_reviews.author: nora s.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: It started with a shipping problem. Had to have the item re shipped. It floated around Houston for days. It is.not as advertised. It does not easily hold the advertised number of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald W. B. Weber

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected, which is a beautiful thing!
customer_reviews.text: We replaced a problem-plagued ice maker with this beauty and have been very happy! We use for a combination of wine and beers (don't judge) and it's a great addition to our kitchen. The unit is amazingly quiet. I love the blue LED lighting and the ability to turn it off as well. I do wish the shelves were available in a darker color but that's a very minor thing.
customer_reviews.author: John in New Orleans

customer_reviews.title: I just received and I am obsessed!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with my cooler. I am a renter I live in a somewhat small space. But this cooler is compact while being able to hold so many bottles at once. Not to mention I am obsessed with the dual temperature control ability so I can chill white wines and keep reds stowed at the perfect 55 degrees to age it. Needless to say this is my new favorite cooler and I am really excited to have it in my life. I totally recommend it to anyone that is a wine lover.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Compact, and perfect for entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my NewAir Cooler! As an avid wine drinker, I am really happy with everything about this cooler. I love that I can keep my reds and whites at different temperatures. The compact size is perfect for fitting under countertops and it doesn't take up a ridiculous amount of space. I can also keep sodas and my husband's craft beers chilled and ready for entertaining. I love that I can lock it as well, to keep little hands out of the adult beverages. I would highly recommend this for wine drinkers and anyone who loves entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Piccirillo

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Works fine (aka keeps wine cool) but there is a very loud vibration coming from the coils that appeared after about 4 months. and it seems to be getting louder. I would skip this and buy a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lipman

customer_reviews.title: perfect for those who like variety or hostess often
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this cooler for about 2 weeks now and am absolutely floored. The dual zones mean I can keep all of my bottles in one place - perfect for those who like a variety of wines or entertain often. The temperature never waivers. This cooler has a lock, which is helpful for those of us with curious kiddos and the design is very sleek and attractive. The noise level is very low, I never notice it, unlike with my last cooler which was pretty loud and obnoxious. The 29 bottle capacity means I can buy bottles in bulk, which at most stores means big savings. This wine cooler is the best!
customer_reviews.author: HusvarFamily

customer_reviews.title: Bring On The Wine!
customer_reviews.text: We are absolutely loving our NewAir wine cooler. It has definitely become a bit of an excuse to buy more and more wine since it holds 29 bottles, but it is great to always have a perfectly chilled bottle. Since it is dual zoned you can chill your red wines and white wines at different temperatures. The wine cooler is also the perfect size! You could put it under a counter-top if you want to, but we just have it as a stand alone unit and we like that it doesn't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: We love our new wine fridge
customer_reviews.text: We love our new wine fridge! The dual temp zones is really convenient, and I love how narrow and sleek it is!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Provenzano

customer_reviews.title: We love our New Air Wine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: We love our New Air Wine Cooler. I love how slim it is, but still fits a ton of bottles. Its super quiet and I love the two temperature areas.
customer_reviews.author: Made with HAPPY

customer_reviews.title: so far perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have had this installed for 8 months. It stores my red and whites. I have checked the temps and they are within a degree of the setting. It is quiet. I hate noise. I must have gotten lucky with mine, so far. Great cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Carl P

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler has all the features you'd want in an affordable and compact wine cooler. We are loving the duel temperature feature to keep red and white wines at the proper temperatures. The wood shelves are perfectly spaced to fit our wine and they are wide enough so the bottles don't fall through. We've had other wine coolers where the bottles fell through the shelves often. This wine cooler is also attractive and looks great in my kitchen with my other stainless steel appliances. It's a great addition to increase the value of your home too.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Wachtel

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I received the NewAir cooler last week. It was packed very well and required very little assembly. It looks beautiful and the exterior is sleek and lovely. Wonderful storage for my wine collection
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

product_meta.title: NewAir AWR-290DB Wine Cooler, 29 Bottle, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Style:29 BottleThe NewAir AWR-290DB 29 bottle compressor wine Cooler features dual zone technology that makes it possible to keep reds and whites in the same cooling unit. Whites get that perfect chill in the upper zone with adjustable temperature settings of 40 to 50 degrees Fahrenheit, and reds can be kept at 50 to 66 degrees Fahrenheit in the lower zone. The easy-to-adjust thermostat puts you in full control of the temperature.
feature_bullets: Attractive blue lighting brightens the interior
Keeps 29 bottles of wine readily accessible on sliding, adjustable beech wood shelves
Measures only 15 inches in width to fit easily
Minimal vibrations ensure quiet operation and protect sediment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars72 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
